product_name: Zoot Active Tri Shorts - Men's - 8" Inseam
long_description: The men's Zoot Active Tri 8" Shorts with a triathlon chamois help you stay dry and comfortable, while special construction delivers targeted muscle support for increased endurance. Performance Endura nylon/spandex fabric wicks moisture and dries fast; offers UPF 50+ sun protection. BIOwrap hem reduces damage caused by muscle vibration and eliminates leg grippers. Inside drawcord at waist gives a secure fit; hip holster pockets store nutrition. Zoot Active Tri 8" Shorts have reflective details that aid visibility in low-light conditions.
short_description: The men's Zoot Active Tri 8" Shorts with a triathlon chamois help you stay dry and comfortable, while special construction delivers targeted muscle support for increased endurance.
